column3:
Perturbed by the thoughts on my mind
no matter how hard I try to sever my love.
column6:
I can cut a thousand strands of hair
but I cannot sever the tangled threads of my mind.

column3: I could give away my crown for the beauty by my side,
column6:
Bowing with my hands clasped, I give away my throne.
Lowering my head, devoted to the beauty by my side.

column3:
but the wheel of fortune turns weals into woes,
and woes into weals.
column6:
The wheel of fate turns, granting blessings or misfortune.
Will it be destiny’s trial or reward?

column3:

the vicissitudes throughout their life.
column6:
Heaven’s will cannot be known,
weaving together weals and woes.

who can break the spell of romance?

who can break the spell of romance?

column3: 妹妹刚从华妃娘娘处过来

column6:
I came from Consort Fleur's palace
and I'm going pay respects to Her Majesty.

column6: Will you please make way for me?

column3: 采月 让余答应先走

Let's go.

column6:
She just became a Companion.
Who is she showing off to?

column3: 背后议论小主 成什么体统

I won't do it again.

column6:
The more you talk about a favored concubine,
the more trouble you bring on yourself.

column3: 忍一时风平浪静 明白吗
column6:
"Forbearance calms a stormy sea."
Do you understand?
Yes.
Let's go.

column6:
Ying'er entertained Imperial Mother yesterday
with the opera song "Eternal Reunion".

column6: I wish to give her the honorary alias Lady Melodic.
What do you think?
A well-deserved name.
Your Majesty, it's time to select a name tag.

column6: I was told that not every concubine has served Your Majesty.
Attendant Sourire has been sick.

column3: 完全不解世事 还有别人吗
column6:
Attendant Chun is too young.
She knows nothing of worldly matters.
Is there anyone else?
Yes, Companion An.
Companion An it is.
My Lady, you're back!

column3: 奴婢找不到您可急坏了
column6: I was worried and looking for you. Where did you go?

column3: 不过是去沈贵人那里坐坐
column6: Where else can I go? I was visiting Lady Shen.

column3: 没有这些名贵的玉台金盏吗
column6:
Hasn't the flower house always said that
they don't have such precious narcissus?

column3: 怎么今日送了这样多来

column6: Why do we have so many today?
Deepest congratulations, My Lady!

Attendant Services has announced
that you will serve His Majesty tonight.

column3: 今儿是小主的好日子啊
column6: What?
It's an auspicious day for you, My Lady!

column3: 花房的奴才就送来了许多的鲜花
column6: The flower house sent all these after this news arrived.

column3: 连御膳房也送了东阿阿胶
column6:
The Imperial Kitchen sent you Dong'e ejiao.
[skin gelatin]

column3: 奴婢伺候小主收拾一下吧
column6:
We don't have too much time.
Let me help you get ready.

column3: 我还以为皇上只当没我这个人呢
column6: I thought His Majesty had forgotten I existed.
There's no rush, My Lady.

His Majesty is still working.
He'll be ready a bit late.

column3: 待会儿啊 奴才们把小主抬进去
column6: The servants will carry you into the chamber.

column3: 小主躺着等皇上就是了
column6: You'll wait for His Majesty lying down.
What's wrong, My Lady?

column3: 姑姑 不知怎的 我好害怕
column6: Madam... I don't know why I feel so scared.
No need to be afraid.
What's wrong?
Your Majesty ... I ...
I'm not that scary.

column3: 侍寝的规矩嬷嬷没教过你吗
column6: Did the madam not tell you the rules?

column3: 朕不喜欢勉强 改日吧
column6: I don't like to force anyone. Maybe next time.
Su Peisheng.
Your Majesty.
Take her away.
Call for Companion Yu.
Yes.

column3: 真晦气 从没当过这样的差事
column6: What bad luck! We've never had a task like this.
A concubine carried in and returned untouched...

column3: 怎么这么晚了谁在唱曲呢
column6: Who is singing at this hour of the night?
It must be Lady Melodic.

column3: 这夜半在宫中高歌可不合规矩
column6: It is inappropriate to sing loudly late at night.

column3: 也该有个活泼些的人伺候
column6:
But on a second thought, His Majesty needs
someone cheerful by his side after a long day of work.
Is there a Noble Lady Shen?
Yes, we saw her at the Selection.
She's gentle and dignified.
That is who the emperor needs.
The Empress is taking good care of the harem.

Your Majesty needs to worry less
and enjoy the years granted by Heaven.

column3: 皇帝却有这么大个后宫
column6:
I only have one emperor,
but one emperor has many a concubine.
I have to keep a watch in case they step out of line.
I heard that His Majesty loves your Kungqu operas.

column3: 听妹妹唱上一曲最能舒心了
column6:
His Majesty is always busy with state affairs.
Your singing helps to ease his mind.

column3: 难怪妹妹这么讨皇上欢心呢
column6: No wonder His Majesty is so fond of you.

column3: 余妹妹都会唱什么曲啊

column3: 遊园惊梦 是嫔妾父亲教的

Do you know the song "A Gem Returned Intact"?
Only Companion An can do justice to that song.

column3: 才能够情肠动人 娓娓道来呀
column6: Only she can convey the emotions truthfully.

column3: 结果闹出这么大的笑话
column6:
It was a thoughtful gesture of the Empress,
but it turned out to be quite laughable.

column3: 皇后肯定气得生了好多皱纹
哪比娘娘您风华正茂呢
column6:
The Empress's face will wrinkle with disappointment.
She cannot compare to Your Highness's radiant beauty.
You certainly speak with a sweet tongue.
My brother had this face massager sent to me.
It is made of the finest jade.

column3: 用它来按脸可长葆青春
column6: Using it can preserve youthful skin.
I'll let you have it.
I thank Your Highness.

column3: 答应出身不好 又不得皇上喜欢
column6: Companion An has a humble birth and isn't favored by His Majesty.

column3: 这辈子呀 算是完了

column6: Her life is over.

column3: 要是我这样被送出养心殿

column6:
If I were sent out of the Palace of Mental Cultivation like her,
I would never show my face in public again.

column3: 可人家呀偏像个没事人似的

column6: But she's acting like nothing happened.
She is.

column3: 小主就是小主 容不得奴才议论
column6: A mistress is not to be discussed by her servants.

column3: 敢背后贬损自己的小主

column6:
If anyone belittles their mistress,
I'll ask Her Majesty to expel them from the palace.

column3: 把他轰出宫去 记住了吗

column6: Is that clear?
Yes. Please forgive me, My Lady.

column3: 沈贵人万安 莞常在万安
column6:
Peace to Noble Lady Shen.
Peace to Attendant Sourire.

- Sourire.
- Sit.
Are you all right?

column3: 我都好 劳两位姐姐挂心了
column6: I'm fine. Thank you both for thinking of me.
Things will get better.
We still have many days ahead of us.

column3: 两位姐姐还有以后 我没有了
column6: You both have your futures. I don't.

column3: 小主 虽说到了二月里

column6: My Lady, it is still cold at night in the second month.

column3: 这两日反比正月里更冷了
column6: It does feel even colder than last month these days.

column3: 小主做了半天针线活了
来 抱着暖炉暖暖吧
column6: You have been doing needlework all night.
Here, keep your hands warm.

did not provide enough winter clothes.

column3: 差不多的都得自己动手

column3: 晌午我按照小主的吩咐
到安小主那儿送些糕点
column6: When I sent the pastries to Companion An at noon,

for money outside the palace.

column3: 怎么余答应就风光得很呀

While ranked at Companion,

reducing the spending in the harem.

Yes.

Go see who it is.

Chun'er, what's wrong?

column6:

They started arguing

column3: 余氏如此蛮横 真是闻所未闻哪

column3: 莞姐姐 眼下该怎么办呢
column6: Sourire, what should we do?

Xiao-Yunzi.

Xiao-Yunzi,
walk Attendant Chun back.

column6:
What a miserable life
to live in the palace without His Majesty's favor.

column3: 余氏恃宠而骄 夜半高歌

This might turn out to be a good thing.
A good thing?

column3: 已经让很多嫔妃不满了
column6: Indeed. Her sudden advancement has displeased many.

She will only dig her own grave
with her reckless behavior.

column3: 整个宫里也就你还乐得自在

The uproar in the palace can almost reach Heaven.
What happened?

column6:

to release Attendant Joie and offer consolations;

column3: 并褫夺余答应妙音娘子的封号

column6:
Companion Yu is deprived of her honorary alias

The Empress Dowager?

column6: Yes.
Why haven't the Emperor and the Empress said anything?

column6:
His Majesty doesn't concern himself with
such a trivial matter before the state affairs.

column3: 正好皇后在太后的宫里

Her Majesty tempers justice with mercy.
A small punishment will teach a greater lesson.

column3: 是啊 余氏虽还是答应

column6:
Yes. While Yu is still ranked at Companion,
losing her alias will affect her status.

column3: 今天的字写得很顺手啊
column6: (pleasant)
The writing went smoothly today.
I'll keep this one.

column3: 余氏受了责罚 也算安分了
column6: Yes.

column3: 娘娘连练字都练得顺畅
column6:
Now that Yu is subdued by her punishment,
Your Majesty can write in peace.

余答应正是得宠的时候

Companion Yu is in high favor at the moment.

If I were to punish her,
His Majesty would much likely intercede.

column3: 与其到时候在皇上情面
和皇后尊严之间做权衡
column6: Rather than weighing His Majesty's feelings against my dignity,

column6:
involving the Empress Dowager can
convince people's mouths and minds.
Your Majesty is wise.

The weather has been more pleasant
and you started to take the medicine less.

column6: You're looking more at ease.
If things go peacefully, I don't have to take the medicine.

you should go outside more and get some sunlight.

put up in the garden outside our palace.
Xiao-Yunzi has built one.

It is surrounded by apricot flowers.
Would you like to go see it?

column6:
"In the dappled shade of apricot flowers,
I play the flute till the first light appears."

column6: You two are trying every trick to get me out the door.
I'll go then.
Vermilion, get me my flute.
Go quickly.

But when you were playing the line

Violet.

column6: What the mind's eye sees is always better than the eyes.
Let's go see the painting.

column3: 回小主的话 果郡王今日入宫了
column6: My Lady, Noble Prince Guo is in the palace today.

column3: 现下在养心殿正与皇上品画呢
column6: He is viewing paintings with His Majesty.

column3: 听说果郡王看上去很稳重
column6:
I hear that Noble Prince Guo carries an air of sophistication.
Is he around forty years old?

column3: 果郡王是康熙三＋五年生的
column6: How could he be?

He was born in the 35th Year of Kangxi Reign.
He's twenty-five or twenty-six this year.
State Prince Heng is a prince in his forties.

column3: 爱和咱们宫人们说说笑笑的
column6: He is easygoing and likes to banter with us.
What about His Majesty the Emperor?
I have no idea.

column3: 来了也是乌泱泱一堆人围着
column6: His Majesty doesn't come  to the harem a lot,
and he's always followed by a mass of servants.

column3: 奴婢身份低微 是见不着皇上的
column6: I am too humble to see His Majesty.

column3: 也是 皇上走到哪儿
column6: That's true.
His Majesty is always followed by a crowd of servants.
You can go. I will have a rest.

column3: 妹妹的遭遇 本宫很是同情
column6: I'm sympathetic to what happened to you.

column3: 可这件事原是太后的旨意

column6:
But there's nothing His Majesty can do
about the Empress Dowager's edict.

column3: 早就知道太后是最好的性子
column6: I have served in the palace since childhood.

I know Her Majesty has a kind temperament,
and never oversees the matters in the harem.

But when I stumbled this time,
Her Majesty went very strict on me.
Someone else must be fanning the flames.

column3: 有人挑唆也好 太后真生气也罢
column6: Whether it was Her Majesty's decision or not,

column3: 好在这半个月的禁足已经过了
column6: your half-month confinement has passed.
There's nothing else Her Majesty can say.

column3: 可是 可是皇上还是不肯见嫔妾
column6: But... But His Majesty is still not willing to see me.

column3: 也是啊 如果长此下去
column6: That's true.

column3: 皇上恐怕要忘了妹妹这个人
column6: I'm afraid His Majesty will forget about you if this continues.
Your Highness, please help me!

column3: 不想再被送到倚梅园被人差遣了
column6:
I don't want to be abandoned
or sent back to work in the garden.
Your Highness.

column3: 也是 既然妹妹要见的是皇上

column6: Since you want to see His Majesty,
you put in the effort to make him see you.
"A request made in person is hard to turn down."

column3: 皇上不会不顾惜妹妹的
column6: His Majesty will show pity towards you.

column3: 可是可是嫔妾不知道该怎么做
column6: But ... But I don't know what to do.

column3: 妹妹擅长做什么 就放手去做
column6: Whatever you are good at, do it.
I thank Your Highness for your advice.

column3: 颂芝 送余答应出去
column6: Songzhi, walk Companion Yu out.
Yes.
My Lady, please.

column3: 这余答应前些日子得宠不少
column6: Companion Yu received a lot of favor before.

column3: 这少了她 还少了个争宠的人
column6: Without her, one fewer person is competing for favor.
Why would Your Highness help her?

column3: 是太后责罚她 又不是皇上责罚
column6: It was the Empress Dowager who punished her, not His Majesty.

column3: 倘若哪日皇上自己想起她来
column6: If one day His Majesty remembers her,
I will have earned her gratitude.

column3: 好让她死心塌地地跟着本宫
替本宫分掉沈贵人的恩宠
column6:
So she will follow me wholeheartedly
and take away Lady Shen's share of favor.

column3: 娘娘 这沈贵人刚进宫

column6:
Your Highness, Lady Shen is new
and her position is not securely rooted.

column3: 娘娘 不必太介意吧
column6: Why would you pay so much attention her?
She is new.

column3: 可这刚进宫就能让皇上许她

column6:
But she was allowed to learn about
palace management so soon.
That is my greatest concern.

column3: 停 你们先回养心殿
column6: Stop. You all go on without me.

column3: 皇上 太后才交代过奴才
column6: I'd like to take a walk alone.
But the Empress Dowager just told me to look after Your Majesty.

If I didn't accompany Your Majesty,
I would be granted death.
I can grant you death right now.
Lower the sedan.
Don't say a word to anyone.
Aye.
Proceed.
Do you want to go higher?
Just a bit.
I know you'd be afraid.
It'll be my turn to push later.

column3: 好啊 我可是什么都不怕的
column6: Sure, I'm not afraid of heights.

column3: 好啊 流朱 竟敢在我背后使坏
column6: Vermilion, you're playing tricks behind my back.
Your Lordship!
Get down if you're scared.

column3: 我不怕 王爷只管推就是了
column6: I'm not scared. Your Lordship can keep pushing.
A bit higher.
And higher.
My Lady.
Greetings to Your Lordship.
My Lady, are you all right?

column3: 刚才不是还女中豪杰一般吗
column6: Why so shy?
You were acting heroic just now.
I apologize for my manners.

column3: 喜欢悄无声息站在人后
column6: I didn't know Your Lordship would sneak behind my back.
Are you blaming my manners now?
I was passing by the garden.

column3: 想起那一日常在的箫声
希望能遇见小主 再聆听一番
column6:
It reminded me of your music
and I was hoping to hear your flute playing again, My Lady.

column3: 可是今日妾身并没有带箫
column6: But today, I do not have the flute with me.
I'll have to wait until the next time.
There are many apricot flowers here.

column3: 你上次吹的曲子也和杏花有关
column6: The song you played is also about apricot flowers.
Is it because you like apricot flowers?

Apricot flowers are not as bright as peach flowers,
or cold as plum blossoms.
They are modest and gentle.
People and flowers are alike.

column3: 才会喜欢品性和婉的花
column6:
Only a modest and gentle person
can be attracted to modest and gentle flowers.

column3: 可妾身并不敢喜欢杏花
column6: But I don't really like apricot flowers.
Why is that?

column3: 杏花虽美 可结出的果子极酸
column6:
Despite the beautiful flowers,
the apricot fruit is sour and the seeds are bitter.

column3: 若做人做事皆是开头美好

column6:
Isn't it meaningless if one's life
starts beautifully but ends in the opposite?

column3: 终年青翠 无花无果也就罢了
column6: I'd rather be the pine and cypress,

living an evergreen life
without producing flowers and fruits.

I've never heard of such a perspective.
It's unique and novel.

column3: 妾身胡言乱语 让王爷见笑了
column6: I hope I did not incur Your Lordship's ridicule.
My manners were abrupt today.
I have two flute scores.

I'll bring them here for your entertainment
at the same hour in five days' time.
I hope you will be here, My Lady.
I am honored to obey.

column3: 妾身有一事相求 请王爷应允
column6: May I trouble Your Lordship for a favor?
Go ahead.

column3: 妾身与王爷相见已属不妥
column6: It is inappropriate for me to meet Your Lordship privately.

column3: 还请王爷不要让旁人知晓

column6:
I hope no one else will know
lest our good name be stained.

column3: 既是清誉又有谁能坏得了呢
column6:
Since it's a good name,
who could damage it?
Your Lordship might not know...

Although we meet in an aboveboard manner,
many mouths spread gossip in the harem.
I do not want to stir up any trouble.
All right.
I thank Your Lordship.
Who is that?

column3: 没有人哪 小主这是怎么了
column6: There's no one outside.
What's the matter, My Lady?

column3: 我和他身份有别 何来良人之说
column6:
We live in two different worlds.
This poem doesn't apply.

column3: 小主怕是看书看得累了
column6: [The Book of Songs]
My Lady should take a break if you're tired from reading.

column3: 内务府也不知道来修修
column6: The paint on this table is coming off.
Why hasn't the Household Department fixed it?

column3: 小允子前几日已经去过了
column6: Xiao-Yunzi requested service several days ago.

column3: 怕是过几日便会派人来修的
column6: They'll probably send someone in a few days.
Your Majesty, please take a break.

Why did Your Majesty stop?
My ears were enjoying what they heard.

column3: 朕吹得不好还是不要吹了
column6:
I don't play the flute well.
I should leave it.

column3: 纯元皇后的箫声可是宫中一绝呀
column6: Empress Première was the most esteemed flute player in the palace.

column3: 现在有人吹得跟她一样好
column6: Now we have another player as skilled as her.
Is Your Majesty talking about Noble Prince Guo?
His Lordship is the best at playing the flute.

- Su Peisheng.
-Yes.
Send for my seventeenth brother.
Aye.

You were gone the whole afternoon.
Why are you back with a gloomy face?

column3: 平白受了好些冷言冷语回来
column6:
I went to the Household Department.
They only had cold words for me.

column3: 不就是拿桌上那些漆吗

column6: You were just asking for some lacquer, not the monthly stipend.

column3: 怎么颠三倒四几次都没个结果
column6: Why have you gotten nothing after so many trips?

column3: 那些个狗眼看人低的家伙
就捎带着不待见咱们碎玉轩
column6:
Consort Fleur is in charge of the harem,
so those snobby curs look at us with disdain.

I don't mind they what say about me,
but they disrespected My Lady.

column3: 平白受了好些不干不净的话
内务府这班混蛋这么倡狂
column6: They made many offensive remarks.

column3: 冬天克扣小主份例的炭
column6: How dare those bastards?

column3: 现在连补个桌角也要挤对人
column6:
They were withholding our charcoal in the winter,
and now won't even give us some paint.
Shh, My Lady is inside.
She will feel sad if she hears it.

column3: 这可怎么好日子还长着呢
column6: What should we do? This is just the start.
We servants can get by.

column3: 可小主小主哪受得了这个闲气
column6: But how can My Lady live with that attitude?

column3: 这个黄规全仗着是华妃的远亲

column6:
Huang Guiquan is playing tyrant
all because he's related to Consort Fleur!

column3: 你且忍着些吧 压点声好吗
column6: Good Madam, Good Madam, please keep it down.

column3: 既然内务府忙那就将就着用吧
column6:
I can make do with the table
if the Household Department is busy.

column3: 也不是什么了不得的事
column6: It's not a big deal.
Yes.

column3: 今日的话 你我都没听过
column6: You and I heard nothing.

column3: 出去也不许指责他们一言半语
column6: Don't blame them when you go out.
Yes.
Serving a concubine like me

column3: 的确是让你们受了不少委屈
column6: must have brought all of you grievances.

Why would you say that, My Lady?
I'm unworthy of such words.

column3: 奴婢从未觉得跟着小主

column6: I've never felt any injustice being in your service.

column3: 后宫中人趋炎附势是寻常事
column6: Everyone in the palace fawns over those hotly in favor.

column3: 他们自然不会把我这个
久病无宠的小主放在眼里
column6: Naturally, no one would have a neglected concubine in their eyes.

column3: 皇兄一定是在哪里听到好的箫声
column6: You must have heard some good flute music somewhere.

column3: 这两天把宫里会吹箫的乐师
column6: You can't even put the flute away.

You must have been listening to
all the flute players in the palace these days.

column3: 隔靴搔痒 不可同日而语呀
column6: That's just like scratching the boot for an itching foot.

column3: 要皇兄听一首箫都这样的难哪
column6: Is it that difficult to find a satisfying player?
I wonder how pretty the player is.
You're rotten to the bone.

column3: 余答应 皇上和果郡王在里头

column6:
Companion Yu, His Majesty is with Noble Prince Guo
and won't see any concubines.

column3: 你都说皇上与果郡王在一块
column6: You've been saying that to me all these days.
Am I a fool to you?
I am telling you the truth, My Lady.
There's nothing I can do if you don't believe me.

column3: 那就麻烦厦公公再去通传一下吧
column6: Can I trouble you to inform His Majesty, Mr. Xia?

column3: 奴才已经回过小主的话

column6: I have already told you, My Lady.

His Majesty is with Noble Prince Guo
and has instructed us not to send any concubines in.
Why would you make it difficult for us servants?

column3: 听说余答应在养心殿前

column6: I heard that Companion Yu kneeled for half a night.
Her knees softened His Majesty's heart.

column3: 哪是跪软的呀 是唱软的
column6: Not her knees. It was her songs.

column3: 听说啊 把嗓子都唱哑了
column6: I heard that she sang until her voice went hoarse.

column3: 不管怎么说 又得宠了
column6: Regardless, she's back in favor.
Look at her go.
She was just a maid like us.

column3: 她唱个曲 摇身一变倒成主子了
column6: But she sang her way to become a mistress.

column3: 去趟内务府拿份例的东西
column6: While we just get eyes rolled at us when claiming the stipends.
Everyone has their fate.

column3: 余氏还没浣碧姐姐长得好看呢
column6: Yu is not even as pretty as you are.
Nonsense.
Xiao-Xiazi, come here.
Yes, My Lady.

column3: 你闲着也是闲着 给我剥核桃吧
column6: Since you have nothing to do, shell these walnuts for me.
With your hands.

column3: 回禀小主 这核桃太硬
column6: My Lady, the walnut shells are hard.

column3: 奴才怕手烂了 也剥不完哪
column6: They'd break my hands before I could crack them.
Now you want to be lazy?

column3: 你不是一向对皇上忠心耿耿的吗
column6: Aren't you always a dutiful servant to His Majesty?

What are your hands worth of
when His Majesty wants some walnut kernels?
Xiao-Xiazi, what time is it?

column3: 回桌皇上已经未时二刻了
column6: Your Majesty, it's half an hour past one.

column3: 糊涂 为何不早点叫朕
column6: Idiot!
Why didn't you wake me up?

column3: 皇上 您一向都这个时辰才睡醒
column6: Your Majesty always wakes up around this time naturally...
Slap yourself.
Get the coat, the coat!
Your Majesty.

column3: 净顾着给皇上剥核桃了
column6: You idiot!

column3: 连请皇上起身的时辰都给忘了
column6:
Shelling all these walnuts...
How could you forget when to wake His Majesty?
Look at your bleeding hands.
How are you going to work now?
All right. No more walnuts. You can go.
I'm taking a walk.
But Your Majesty, it's raining outside.
That's what I'm taking the walk for.
You can leave.
Your Majesty.
Stop.

column3: 太后请您到寿康宫去一趟
column6: The Empress Dowager wishes to see you right away.

column3:
I dimly recall the colorful blooms in every summer.
They are as distant as the autumn moon in the water.
column6:
The dreams I dimly recall;
The past I hardly remember,
amidst the autumn moons and the spring flowers.
Like the moon's reflection on water
or flowers seen through mist - floating and drifting.

column3:
He loved me with a volatile heart.
And before I knew it, we fell apart.

Behind me are the promises and longing.
Before me lie the flute and the zither.

I loved you with my body and soul
But you hurt me from head to toe.

My wish ran athwart
and I ended up a fool of my destiny.
column6:
My wish ran against my will.
Behold the mockery of destiny and the game of fate.

column3: My love was the wind-swept flowers from a tree.
column6:
My unwavering love is gone
like flowers swept away in the wind.

column3:
A plum bloomed in winter hoping for a fruitful summer.
But the irresistible winds of destiny destroyed her wish.

You can hear the flapping of a phoenix
but you will never see it.
column6:
A phoenix about to take flight rustles its wings
but the arc of its flight is unseen.

column3: What you see is the falling leaves from the phoenix tree.
column6:
The phoenix tree sways in the wind,
shedding memories in the whispers of the falling leaves.
